item.title: I went travelling on a Mobius Strip
item.description: I recently helped my sister design her album cover art for her song I went travelling on a Mobius Strip and I really liked the drawing I did:D Her song is on Spotify as well as Youtube! I really like the song and it is stuck in my head.

item.title: Construction Workers in Singapore
item.description: This was the final paper I wrote for a USP module called Human Trafficking and Labour Migration (UWC2101F) It may not be the best, but I was quite proud of it as it was my first time writing an actual long paper, which I would not have done if not for USP. Construction Workers in Singapore: Their Precarious Situation and Ways to Mitigate It Abstract This paper examines the predicament of construction workers in Singapore, and uses Ruhs and Martinâ€™s paper on the tradeoffs between numbers and rights of workers to explain the minimal rights the workers receive.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! Welcome to my blog:D I’m Linglong, currently a computer science student at National University of Singapore, also in the University Scholars Programme. I’ve separated my blog into two sections, one for more serious and official posts here and one for more creative things such as my hobbies over here, located in the CREATIVE tab at the top. You can also find me on Github or contact me at my email hulinglong01@gmail.
